eu.ehri.extension.base

Class AbstractResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.extension.base.AbstractResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TxCheckedResource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAccessibleResource, AdminResource, BatchResource, ImportResource, PermissionGrantResource, PermissionsResource, ToolsResource

    public abstract class AbstractResource
extends Object
implements TxCheckedResource
    Base class for web service resources.

      • getSerializer

        protected Serializer getSerializer()
        Get a serializer according to passed-in serialization config.

        Currently the only parameter is _ip=[propertyName] which ensures a given property is always included in the output.

        Returns:
        a vertex serializer

      • isPatch

        protected Boolean isPatch()
        Determine if a PATCH header is present. Ideally, Jersey would support the HTTP PATCH method, but it doesn't so we have to user a header.
        Returns:
        Patch is given

      • isStreaming

        protected boolean isStreaming()
        Determine if the X-Stream header is present. This changes the semantics of paged results so that no full count is fetched (making it more efficient.)
        Returns:
        Patch is given

      • single

        protected <T extends Entity> javax.ws.rs.core.Response single(T item)
        Return a default response from a single frame item.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the item's generic type
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        Returns:
        a serialized representation, with location and cache control headers.

      • getCacheControl

        protected <T extends Entity> javax.ws.rs.core.CacheControl getCacheControl(T item)
        Get a cache control header based on the access restrictions set on the item. If it is restricted, instruct clients not to cache the response.
        Parameters:
        item - The item
        Returns:
        A cache control object.
